summary: Captain Marvel - Un motion poster ricorda che mancano 100 giorni all'uscita
title: Captain Marvel - Un motion poster ricorda che mancano 100 giorni all'uscita
body:
Captain Marvel – Un motion poster ricorda che mancano 100 giorni all’uscita

I Marvel Studios hanno avviato oggi il counting down ufficiale verso l’uscita nelle sale americane di Captain Marvel, il cinecomic con Brie Larson protagonista.

L’avvio del conto alla rovescia è arrivato grazie al rilascio – via Twitter – di un bellissimo motion poster con Brie Larson nei panni dell’iconica supereroina. Ad oggi mancano pertanto 100 giorni all’uscita americana.

Captain…

View On WordPress

summary: “Marvel Fatigue” is the most bizarre concept to me, like “oh nooo for just two to three hours, for three times out of a 365 day...
body: “Marvel Fatigue” is the most bizarre concept to me, like “oh nooo for just two to three hours, for three times out of a 365 day year, I’d have to sit and engage in pure escapism, completely separate from this hellscape of a reality, that’s immersive and fleshed out enough that I can lose myself to it and forget all the shit in my real life. just get away. just for a couple of hours. three times a year. oh noooo the Fatigeaux “

reblog.comment: “Marvel Fatigue” is the most bizarre concept to me, like “oh nooo for just two to three hours, for three times out of a 365 day year, I’d have to sit and engage in pure escapism, completely separate from this hellscape of a reality, that’s immersive and fleshed out enough that I can lose myself to it and forget all the shit in my real life. just get away. just for a couple of hours. three times a year. oh noooo the Fatigeaux “

trail.content: “Marvel Fatigue” is the most bizarre concept to me, like “oh nooo for just two to three hours, for three times out of a 365 day year, I’d have to sit and engage in pure escapism, completely separate from this hellscape of a reality, that’s immersive and fleshed out enough that I can lose myself to it and forget all the shit in my real life. just get away. just for a couple of hours. three times a year. oh noooo the Fatigeaux “
